item.title: Fox goes on biting spree in Karnataka's Raichur; four injured
item.description:
<![CDATA[Fox goes on biting spree in Karnataka's Raichur; four injured
The fox, which came into the city from a forest area in search of food, bit and injured a girl, a woman, and two elderly men at Shriramanagar....]]>
